page.title: 14SWANDYKE FARM 1
page.content: {Mr.W. Tillson}has a farm in{Swandyke in{Freiston.}Mr.Tillson's father owned his farm before him.He started with{20 {acres}of land,previously he had been a farm foreman.Mr.Tillson's father owned {one COW,one HORSE,PIGS and CHICKENS. Mr.Tillson owns 125 acres of land,but no livestock because there is not enough profit. Instead he has{50 acres {of cauliflowers,30 acres of potatoes {and brussel sprouts,15 acres of {cabbages, 10 acres of onions and wheat {and 8 acres of daffodils.}Mr.Tillson is able to grow more crops than he has land because the land around here is some of the best in the country,so he can double his crop ,that is to have two crops a year on his land.He was 7 when he moved to the farm and he went on to the land straight from school, aged 14.His son is now in partnership with him.
